items.label: begin game!
items.command: forcemenuoff; if $coop == 1 then "match_setup_active 0; deathmatch 0; coop 1" else "match_setup_active 1; deathmatch 1; coop 0; maxplayers $match_setup_maxplayers; maxclients $match_setup_maxplayers"; map $_ui_nextserver force

items.label: start server
items.command: if $match_setup_format == "" then match_setup_format regular; if $match_setup_gametype == "" then match_setup_gametype ffa; if $match_setup_modifier == "" then match_setup_modifier standard; if $match_setup_length == "" then match_setup_length standard; if $match_setup_type == "" then match_setup_type standard; if $match_setup_bestof == "" then match_setup_bestof bo1; if $match_setup_maxplayers == "" then match_setup_maxplayers 8; pushmenu startserver

footer.subtext: Â© 1997-2026 id Software LLC. Q2REPRO/WORR fan continuation.

items.label: Are you sure you want to forfeit?
Match settings are set on server start.
as a best-of set of games.
